MajorClaims.MC1: the zoo deserves maintenance and public respect
MajorClaims.MC2: the role of zoos towards both human and animals is undeniably indispensable

Claims.C1: the zoo should be considered as a means of education with regard to providing real and vivid materials for learners
Claims.C2: the zoo also serve as a means of ecological protection

Premises.P1: With zoos, pupils will have a chance of observing the habit and unique instinct of, for instance, a lion or a crocodile
Premises.P2: zoos conduce to the acquisition of knowledge at various levels
Premises.P3: it is of university students' benefits to do biological research based on practical statistics and live recordings, which otherwise would not be at hand
Premises.P4: Nowadays the process of globalisation is accompanied by the encroachment upon natural habitats, which consequently calls for the help of zoos
Premises.P5: the ever-increasing huntings are having a heavy toll on rare and specious species
Premises.P6: Only when zoos appear are such distinction-driven animals as: giraffe, panda, koala or leopard provided with their own inaccessible territory
